name: The Secure AI Corporation
description: Secure AI delivers mission-critical generative AI solutions for the $900B defense sector that operate completely offline and on edge devices. Our technology enables advanced AI capabilities for classified environments, maritime vessels, unmanned systems, and orbital platforms--bringing intelligence exactly where it's needed most.
